report.title: Species images for a NatureSpot site
report.description: Lists distinct species at a NatureSpot Wild Place.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT ON (taxon_group, taxon) external_key, taxon_group, taxon_group_id, taxon, common, image_path, image_caption, date_start, date_end, date_type FROM ( SELECT * FROM naturespot.vw_occurrences_by_location WHERE name='#site_name#' ORDER BY date_start desc ) sub ) foo WHERE 1=1
